comment: Very good kind person. She even made her own powerpoints to try to explain the lab in more detail and depth. The powerpoints that she makes are very helpful when trying to finish the lab work. She is a good grader and is prepared to answer any questions!

I would definitely take your PHYS1112L with Dr. Zhai. She provided some lengthy pre-lectures but she was so helpful during the labs that I was able to look past it. She is always willing to help students when they are confused, which is so nice in a lab class. Take it from me who gets very anxious during lab, she is an amazing professor. TAKE HER!

Probably the easiest A you can get by just doing the work. Her accent is hard to understand, but you can get the necessary information to do the lab. She helps you if you are struggling with anything during lab. Barely takes off points for things.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Would take again, fair grader if show work.
